author: Adedayo Akala
title: Two-thirds of internships are canceled. How students can stay competitive in job market
description: A new survey finds that 64% of college students who had job internships canceled say there was no offer of compensation.
content:
Emotions run high at the Olin College of Engineering "Fauxmencement" for senior students on March 12, 2020, two months early, held because of coronavirus fears in Needham, MA.
Internships for college students are among the job opportunities hard hit as a res… [+11149 chars]
